DOC.criteria: Adult male female , age 2060 yr Staff student International Medical University , IMU/ Staff Malaysian Palm Oil Board , MPOB facilitate centralize consumption test fats/snacks BMI 21 30 kg/m2 Abnomal liver function test ( elevate transaminase alanine aminotransferase , ALT ; aspartate aminotransferase , AST ) ) / abnormal kidney function test ( elevate plasma creatinine ) History type 2 diabetes mellitus , cancer , stomach ulcer , drug abuse alcoholism Smokers On lipid/blood pressure lower medication/supplements Blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg Fasting total cholesterol > 6.5 mmol/L Fasting TAG > 2.0 mmol/L Candidates go abroad plan schedule dietary intervention
